Welcome to Jackson House

Now Open, we're ushering in a new era of hospitality in Woodinville, WA. We specialize in curated cocktails and artisanal local cuisine. You're invited to experience Jackson House - where every cocktail, plate, and detail is crafted with purpose.

Reserve your table on Tock. The finest in Woodinville awaits!

What People Are Saying

— Ben D. (Google Reviews)

"My favorite place in Woodinville. "

— Ralph N. (Google Reviews)

"I had such a lovely experience. I can't wait to return, the food was so delicious."

— Cristi C. (Yelp)

"This is hands down THE best place to eat in woodinville."

— Samantha C. (Google Reviews)

— advinetures.ca

"The lamb chops were so good I almost cried."

— Andrew N. (Google Reviews)
